scripts.dev: bunx tsc; bunx webpack build --config ./webpack.dev.config.js; cp -a assets src/index.html src/style.css dist2; mv dist2/bundle.js dist2/bundle.min.js
scripts.build: bunx tsc; bunx webpack build --config ./webpack.build.config.js;cp -a assets src/index.html src/style.css dist2; bunx google-closure-compiler --js=dist/bundle.js --js_output_file=dist/bundle.min.js -O ADVANCED; rm -r dist1
